meanings.definition: A poster or notice for public display.
meanings.sent1: The affiche on the wall advertised the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent2: I saw an affiche at the bus stop announcing the new movie release.
meanings.sent3: The affiche on the tree made the birds curious about the event.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with affiches, creating a colorful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The affiche with bold letters caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To post or display a notice or poster.
meanings.sent1: She will affiche the event details on the community board.
meanings.sent2: They affiche the rules on the classroom wall for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to affiche its dominance by scratching the furniture.
meanings.sent4: His smile affiched his happiness better than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The artist affiched his masterpiece in the gallery for all to admire.
